name: ONE MAN HIDE AND SEEK
description:
You are captured by the doll hurry save yourself.........

CONTROLS

Move with WASD

Pickup items with E

Throw items with Q

Keys disappear when picked up

Shoot with Fire 1

Jump with Space

Discord 

https://discord.gg/FP68NeuN

NOTE

This game is made for SCREAMJAM 2021 by a beginner game dev.
